conditions.name: Orthopedic Care
conditions.shortDescription: Back pain, Arthritis, Neck pain, Frozen shoulder, Rotator cuff injuries, TMJ dysfunction
conditions.fullDescription: Our orthopedic care specialists treat a wide range of musculoskeletal conditions affecting bones, joints, muscles, ligaments, and tendons. We use evidence-based treatments to reduce pain and improve function.

conditions.name: Neurological Care
conditions.shortDescription: Stroke rehabilitation, Sciatica and other radiculopathies, Parkinson's disease
conditions.fullDescription: We provide specialized care for neurological conditions affecting the brain, spinal cord, and nerves. Our goal is to help restore function and improve quality of life.

conditions.name: Workplace Injuries
conditions.shortDescription: Ergonomics, Work conditioning, Functional capacity evaluation, Acute management of injury
conditions.fullDescription: We help workers recover from job-related injuries and prevent future problems through proper ergonomics and body mechanics training.

conditions.name: Hand Therapy
conditions.shortDescription: Fractures, Tendinitis, Carpal tunnel, Arthritis, Trigger finger, Tendon repairs, Contractures
conditions.fullDescription: Our certified hand therapists provide specialized care for hand, wrist, and elbow conditions. We focus on restoring function and reducing pain.

conditions.name: Sports Injuries
conditions.shortDescription: Ankle sprains, Shin splints, Tennis or Golfers elbow, ACL, MCL or PCL strain or tear
conditions.fullDescription: We treat athletes of all levels, from weekend warriors to competitive athletes. Our sports rehabilitation programs focus on safe return to activity.

conditions.name: Concussion Therapy
conditions.shortDescription: Meniere's syndrome, Stroke or brain injury, Neck-related dizziness, Migraines
conditions.fullDescription: Our vestibular rehabilitation program helps patients with dizziness, vertigo, and balance problems. We use specialized techniques to retrain the brain.
